faq_1.answer: Stay tuned on AMV's Instagram and you can also direct messages via Instagram for more info.
faq_1.question: How to join this team?

faq_2.answer: Everyone from every faculty and majors at Universitas Indonesia are welcome to join.
faq_2.question: Who can join the team?

faq_3.answer: International & national exposure, Opportunity to compete in many competitions, Enhancing hands-on skills and knowledge, Relation with experienced alumni, Real research project experience
faq_3.question: What will I get when you join AMV UI?

faq_4.answer: Kontes Kapal Cepat Tak Berawak Nasional, International Roboboat Competition, International MATE Underwater Robot Competition, Singapore Autonomous Underwater Vehicle Challenge, Smartphone Control Boat Competition, and many more as you wish.
faq_4.question: What competitions will I experience?

faq_5.answer: No need for specific skills to join this team. We will learn together once we enter the team.Just give your best work to learn so many things here.
faq_5.question: What kind of skills do I have to join the team?
